question: Which body, along with Ministry of Power has launched the ‘Electricity Access in India and Benchmarking Distribution Utilities’ report?
explanation:
The 'Electricity Access in India and Benchmarking Distribution Utilities’ report has been launched by NITI Aayog, Ministry of Power, Rockefeller Foundation and Smart Power India.
The report has been complied based on a survey conducted across 10 states, representing about 65 % of the total rural population of India.
